title: The Washington Football Team Renames Itself the Commanders
sub_head: The club dropped its longtime moniker, the Redskins, in 2020 after amplified criticisms that it was derogatory toward Native Americans
body:
Washingtonâ€™s NFL team finally has a new name: the Commanders.
The decision was unveiled after two seasons of playing as the Washington Football Team and 87 years as the Redskins, a moniker the team dropped in 2020 after amplified backlash over the name widely seen as a racial slur.
